testsuite.name: com.reliaquest.api.exception.GlobalExceptionHandlerTest

testcase.name: handleEmployeeNotFoundException should return NOT_FOUND with appropriate error details
ErrorResponse getters and setters should work correctly
handleRateLimitedException should return TOO_MANY_REQUESTS with retry header
handleValidationExceptions should return BAD_REQUEST with field errors
handleExternalApiException should return appropriate status with error details
ValidationErrorResponse getters and setters should work correctly
handleGeneralException should return INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR for unexpected exceptions
handleNoResourceFoundException should return NOT_FOUND for missing URLs
